tasks.title: Set up project
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository and set up the initial Angular project structure.

tasks.title: Design Kanban Board
tasks.description: Create the initial design for the Kanban board UI, including columns and tasks layout.

tasks.title: Implement Task Drag-and-Drop
tasks.description: Add drag-and-drop functionality to move tasks between columns on the Kanban board.

tasks.title: Code Review
tasks.description: Conduct a review of the latest code to ensure it meets quality standards.

tasks.title: Deploy to Production
tasks.description: Deploy the completed application to the production environment.
